etymology.description: Phonetic 丣(丣) (liǔ, no direct translation) + Semantic 田(田) (tián, "field") -> stay
etymology.interpretation: 畱(留) (liú, "stay") combines the phonetic component 丣(丣) to suggest sound and the semantic component 田(田) to suggest a location, implying a sense of remaining or staying in one place.
etymology.simplification: 畱(留) was simplified to 留 by keeping the original semantic component 田(田, "field") unchanged and modifying the phonetic element 丣(丣) to 卯(卯, "fourth Earthly Branch") from historical script variations.
